name: Kung Fruit
description:
Kung Fruit is an arcade mobile game directly inspired by Fruit Ninja.

Use your deadly fingers to pierce through the fruits! With agility and precise precision. This is the first game I developed using Unity by myself and it was made in less than 5 days.

All assets used are free in the Unity Asset Store.

---

How To Play?
  1. If you're playing on PC, use the mouse to click on the fruits.
  2. If you're playing on mobile, simply use touch with your finger.

Get as many high score as you can!

Credits

Prototype made by Joshua Yau
With game engine Unity
